thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 01 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Just Eat Reports Q1 Group Revenue £177.4 Million, up 49 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Just Eat Reports Q1 Group Revenue £177.4 Million, up 49 Pct
text:
May 1 (Reuters) - Just Eat Plc:
* UK ORDERS INCREASED BY 24% TO 29.7 MILLION (Q1 2017: 24.0 MILLION)
* REPORTED REVENUES WERE UP 49% TO £177.4 MILLION IN Q1 (Q1 2017: £118.9 MILLION)
* GROUP REVENUE £177.4 MILLION, UP 49% * INTERNATIONAL ORDERS WERE UP 46% TO 21.9 MILLION (Q1 2017: 15.0 MILLION)
* REITERATE GUIDANCE GIVEN AT TIME OF 2017 FULL YEAR RESULTS IN MARCH OF GROUP REVENUE OF BETWEEN £660 - 700 MILLION
* REITERATE GUIDANCE OF UEBITDA OF £165 - 185 MILLION IN 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
